samples.question: How is important, I am sorry, how important is quality versus price when you make a purchase?
samples.transcript: Well, I think it mainly depends on the price itself. Sometimes the price can, if the price is high, then it is more likely for the quality to be good too. samples.question: What is your daily routine?

samples.question: What skills do you think are indeed to get a good job these days?
samples.transcript: I think the first skill necessary in any kind of job would be the specialized skill. Because for example, if a person wants to become a musician, they need to be able to play some music and have fundamental knowledge about it. But aside from that, soft skills like teamwork and child management are also important and there are deciding factors whether you can work in a group or not.

samples.question: Do you think women should be able to do all the same jobs that men do?
samples.transcript: The thoughts that women are inferior to men, I believe is quite outdated. Like, in the past, people used to think that only men can go to school and get a job and become successful, while women should just stay at home and become housewives. but, in the contemporary world, I do not think that is relevant anymore because you can see a lot of female leaders and politicians out there, so yeah, I think women are just as careful as men. Okay well then The last question How has technology changed the way we work Well I say that technology has quite an impact on our lives especially in work Because in the past we used to work manually and it cost a lot of human resource time and effort But nowadays we have automatic machines which pretty much does everything for us and we only have to like program and manage the system So yeah it makes our work process a lot quicker and easier Okay, yeah. So I see that you are doing pretty well for the IELTS speaking test.

samples.question: So can you share with us some tips that you learned speaking in IELTS?
samples.transcript: With regards to speaking, my first tip would be do not stick to the script. Because many people think that taking detailed notes might help you speak more fluently. But in reality, it is just going to limit you to everything that you have written and make you sound unnatural. And my second advice would be do not try to remember everything because well we will not be able to to be honest. So instead of trying to say things words by words it'd be more efficient to divide your speech into different parts and just move from one part to another.
samples.transcript_original: With regards to speaking, my first tip would be don't stick to the script. Because many people think that taking detailed notes might help you speak more fluently. But in reality, it's just gonna limit you to everything that you've written and make you sound unnatural. And my second advice would be don't try to remember everything because well we won't be able to to be honest. So instead of trying to say things words by words it'd be more efficient to divide your speech into different parts and just move from one part to another.

But in reality, it is just going to limit you to everything that you have written and make you sound unnatural. And my second advice would be do not try to remember everything because well we will not be able to to be honest. So instead of trying to say things words by words it'd be more efficient to divide your speech into different parts and just move from one part to another.
